post:
VEEBLE (www.veeble.org)

Veeble offers versatile web services including Virtual Private Servers, dedicated servers, remote desktop solutions and web hosting. To add with, we weave a closer and reliable web with services complementing the fastest technology. We offer affordable 24x7 managed services that promises a worry free hosting for you.


Introducing VPS Reseller, the ultimate VPS package for you.

» Create & Delete VPS Anytime
You can deploy Linux and Windows VPS anytime from the control panel using the available resources. You can also delete the VPS without any hassles.

» Assign VPS to users you Create
You can create user accounts and assign the deployed VPS to these accounts. The users can login and manage the VPS through a separate control panel.

» White Labelled Control Panel
You will be able to provide a white labelled control panel to your users. All you need is a domain name and we will assist you with white labelled setup.

» Linux & Windows Operating Systems
You can deploy VPS with both Linux and Windows Operating Systems readily available in the control panel. There are no separate license charges for Windows Operating Systems.

» Free 1 Gbps Connectivity
You can avail free 1 Gbps Bandwidth on all VPS deployed.

» Multiple Locations
Create VPS in UK and US locations.


-------------------------------------
VPS Reseller Packages
-------------------------------------


» Number of VPS: 4 onwards
» Total CPU Cores: 8 onwards
» Total RAM: 4 GB onwards
» Total Disk: 40 GB onwards
» Number of IPs: 4 onwards
» Total Bandwidth: 4 TB onwards per month in 1Gbps Port
» US & UK Locations


Starting from just $25/month

Configure & Order Now
